en: It is a lovely bright, sunny day.
zh: 今天是个阳光明媚的好日子。

en: Peppa and her family are going for a picnic!
zh: 佩奇和她的家人外出野餐！

en: Daddy Pig is bringing the picnic basket.
Picnic-blanket, bread, cheese, tomatoes and lemonade.
zh: 野餐布，面包，奶酪，蕃茄和柠檬汽水。
有没有什么东西我们忘记了？

en: Mummy's home-made strawberry cake is there, too.
zh: 妈妈亲手做的草莓蛋糕也在这里。

en: This looks like just the spot for our picnic!
zh: 这个地方看起来很适合我们野餐！

en: We should run around a bit and get some exercise!
zh: 我们应该稍微跑一下做点运动！

en: I want to eat, then have a nap.
zh: 我想吃点东西，再睡一会。

en: I certainly don't want to run around.
Maybe Daddy should run around a bit.
But later, I will get some exercise,even if no one else does.
zh: 但是过一会儿我会做些运动，即使没有其他人做。

en: Good idea, Mummy Pig! I'm really hungry!
zh: 好主意，猪妈妈！我真的饿了！

en: I thought you wanted to run around a bit, Daddy Pig?
zh: 我记得你想到处跑跑的，猪爸爸？

en: Look! There's a little duck pond!
zh: 瞧！那里的池塘有群小鸭子！

en: Mummy, can we feed the ducks?
zh: 妈妈，我们可以喂那些鸭子吗？

en: Yes, you can feed them the rest of the bread.
zh: 当然，你们可以用剩余的面包喂他们。

en: Peppa and George love feeding bread to ducks.
zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢喂面包给鸭子。

en: Mummy, I think they want some more.
zh: 妈妈，我想他们想要更多一些。

en: That was the last of the bread.

zh: 我相信他们已经吃饱了。

en: Sorry, Mrs. Duck, we've no more bread.
zh: 对不起，鸭子女士，我们没有更多的面包了。
鸭子们想要更多的食物。

en: So much for Daddy Pig and his exercise!
zh: 猪爸爸只是嘴上说说要锻炼！

en: Peppa told you，there's no more bread!
zh: 佩奇已经告诉你们，没有面包了！

en: Mummy, we do have strawberry cake!
zh: 妈妈，我们还有草莓蛋糕嘛！

en: Well, if there's any cake left over,you can give it to the ducks.
zh: 好的，如果有剩余的蛋糕，你可以分些给鸭子们。

en: Everyone likes Mummy Pig's home-made strawberry cake!
zh: 每个人都喜欢猪妈妈亲手做的草莓蛋糕！
它只是一只小小的黄蜂而已！

en: There! You see, all you had to do is stay still!
zh: 飞走了！你看，你只要呆着别动就行了！

en: I hope the wasp doesn't sting Daddy.
zh: 我希望黄蜂没有叮到爸爸。

en: No, Daddy is running too fast for the wasp to catch him.
zh: 不会的，爸爸跑得很快黄蜂追不上他。

en: Let's eat our cake before the wasp comes back.
zh: 趁黄蜂还没回来，我们吃蛋糕吧。

en: Oh, no! we forgot to leave any for the ducks!
zh: 哦，不！我们忘记留些给鸭子们了！

en: You said you would run around and get some exercise,
zh: 你不是说过你要跑跑做些运动的吗？

en: Daddy Pig! But I didn't believe you'd do it!
zh: 猪爸爸！但是我没有想到你真的做到了！

en: Luckily, I managed to hang on to my slice of strawberry cake!
zh: 幸好，我紧紧抓住了我的草莓蛋糕！

en: We promised the rest of the cake for the ducks!
zh: 我们答应了剩下的蛋糕要分给鸭子们的！
你们真是很幸运的鸭子。
